Name: Louisville Sour
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker. DRY SHAKE (without ice) and strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: A hint of tobacco liqueur perfectly suits this sour named after bourbon's spiritual home.
History: Created in 2013 by Amanda Humphrey of Maxxium UK for Maker's Mark.
Nutrition: One serving of Louisville Sour contains 208 calories
Garnish: Lemon zest twist & dash Angostura aromatic bitters
